title: Bangladesh Polls To Be Delayed? Muhammad Yunus Cites Need For Key Reforms
content: In a key address to diplomats in Dhaka on Sunday, Muhammad Yunus, the Chief Adviser to Bangladesh's interim government, called for comprehensive reforms before holding the next general elections.
summary: In a key address to diplomats in Dhaka on Sunday, Muhammad Yunus, the Chief Adviser to Bangladesh's interim government, called for comprehensive reforms before holding the next general elections.

title: Joe Biden Accused Of "Impeachable" Offence Ahead Of Democratic Convention
content: US House of Representatives Republicans issued a report on Monday alleging Democratic President Joe Biden committed impeachable offences, but it was unclear whether they would push for a vote.
summary: US House of Representatives Republicans issued a report on Monday alleging Democratic President Joe Biden committed impeachable offences, but it was unclear whether they would push for a vote.

title: Switzerland Offers Rs 50 Lakh For Solutions To Clear Ammunition From Lakes
content: The Swiss government is looking for innovative solutions to remove thousands of tonnes of ammunition dumped in the lakes. And it comes with a massive 50,000 franc (Rs 48.5 lakhs) prize money.
summary: The Swiss government is looking for innovative solutions to remove thousands of tonnes of ammunition dumped in the lakes. And it comes with a massive 50,000 franc (Rs 48.5 lakhs) prize money.

title: Gen Z Is Turning Their Climate Change Anxiety Into Activism, Here's Why
content: In June 2024, 13 young people in Hawaii took on their state government in court and won the right to have greater input in climate policy.
summary: In June 2024, 13 young people in Hawaii took on their state government in court and won the right to have greater input in climate policy.

title: Ukraine's Marine Battalion Returns To Fight Russia As Incursion Continues
content: The 501st Marine Battalion's troubles began during Russia's annexation of Crimea in 2014.
summary: The 501st Marine Battalion's troubles began during Russia's annexation of Crimea in 2014.

title: Russia Bans Clooney Foundation, Enlists It As "Undesirable" Organization
content: Russia's prosecutor general on Monday said it had banned a foundation started by US film star George Clooney and his human rights lawyer wife Amal.
summary: Russia's prosecutor general on Monday said it had banned a foundation started by US film star George Clooney and his human rights lawyer wife Amal.

title: Hezbollah Claims Attacks On Israeli Troops For "Infiltrating" Lebanese Border
content: Hezbollah on Monday claimed attacks on troops and military positions in northern Israel, including a drone strike on a base and an assault on soldiers allegedly "infiltrating" near the Lebanese border.
summary: Hezbollah on Monday claimed attacks on troops and military positions in northern Israel, including a drone strike on a base and an assault on soldiers allegedly "infiltrating" near the Lebanese border.

title: Opinion: Is India Really At Risk Of A Monkeypox Outbreak?
content: The WHO, on August 14, declared the current upsurge of Mpox or Monkeypox in Central Africa as a global emergency requiring urgent action. Though India has not reported any cases yet, the Central government is keeping a close eye on the situation.
summary: The WHO, on August 14, declared the current upsurge of Mpox or Monkeypox in Central Africa as a global emergency requiring urgent action. Though India has not reported any cases yet, the Central government is keeping a close eye on the situation.

title: 3-Year-Old Boy Fights For Life After Accidentally Shooting Himself In US
content: The Newark Department of Public Safety asked gun owners to be "vigilant about gun safety by taking extra precautions when storing a firearm."
summary: The Newark Department of Public Safety asked gun owners to be "vigilant about gun safety by taking extra precautions when storing a firearm."

title: US Model Sues Airline After Swallowing "Broken Plastic" In Beverage
content: Shana Wall was served the beverage on a flight to Rome on May 1. The plastic in the drink injured her throat, esophagus, vocal chords and digestive system.
summary: Shana Wall was served the beverage on a flight to Rome on May 1. The plastic in the drink injured her throat, esophagus, vocal chords and digestive system.

title: Antony Blinken Pushes For Gaza Truce In Israel, Calls It "A Decisive Moment"
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, in Israel to push for a Gaza truce, said on Monday ongoing negotiations were "maybe the last" chance to reach an agreement to end the war.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, in Israel to push for a Gaza truce, said on Monday ongoing negotiations were "maybe the last" chance to reach an agreement to end the war.

title: Elite Jewish High School Graduates Shun Columbia Amid Protest Turmoil
content: The Ivy League college has been hit by waves of protests since Hamas' October 7, 2023 invasion of Israel.
summary: The Ivy League college has been hit by waves of protests since Hamas' October 7, 2023 invasion of Israel.

title: Democrats Cheer Biden, Harris In Chicago Convention Amid Protests
content: Democrats gathered in Chicago on Monday to celebrate Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign for the White House against Republican Donald Trump and to honor President Joe Biden, whose exit from the race turned his party's fortunes around.
summary: Democrats gathered in Chicago on Monday to celebrate Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign for the White House against Republican Donald Trump and to honor President Joe Biden, whose exit from the race turned his party's fortunes around.

title: A Bittersweet Convention Farewell As Joe Biden Passes Torch To Kamala Harris
content: US President Joe Biden will give a bittersweet farewell address at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago on Monday, passing the torch to Kamala Harris as the party's nominee for November's election.
summary: US President Joe Biden will give a bittersweet farewell address at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago on Monday, passing the torch to Kamala Harris as the party's nominee for November's election.

title: UN Warns Of "Unacceptable" Rising Violence Against Human Aid Workers
content: The United Nations on Monday condemned the "unacceptable" level of violence becoming commonplace against humanitarian workers, a record 280 of whom were killed worldwide in 2023.
summary: The United Nations on Monday condemned the "unacceptable" level of violence becoming commonplace against humanitarian workers, a record 280 of whom were killed worldwide in 2023.

title: Malala Yousafzai's Post On Taliban After Attending Taylor Swift Concert
content: Malala Yousafzai said she had a "magical" moment at Taylor Swift's concert and remembered the significance of the singer in her life.
summary: Malala Yousafzai said she had a "magical" moment at Taylor Swift's concert and remembered the significance of the singer in her life.

title: Actors Mindy Kaling, Kerry Washington To Host Democratic Convention
content: As the Democratic National Convention is set to kick off in Chicago tonight, several prominent figures, including comedian-actress Mindy Kaling, actor Kerry Washington, Ana Navarro, and Tony Goldwyn, have been confirmed as hosts for the convention.
summary: As the Democratic National Convention is set to kick off in Chicago tonight, several prominent figures, including comedian-actress Mindy Kaling, actor Kerry Washington, Ana Navarro, and Tony Goldwyn, have been confirmed as hosts for the convention.

title: AI News Sites Mimicking Media Outlets To Spew Fake News About US Polls
content: Pro-Kremlin sites masquerading as US "news" outlets have dished out unfounded claims that Democrats plotted to assassinate Donald Trump, a prime example of how phoney AI-powered portals are spewing inflammatory falsehoods in an election year.
summary: Pro-Kremlin sites masquerading as US "news" outlets have dished out unfounded claims that Democrats plotted to assassinate Donald Trump, a prime example of how phoney AI-powered portals are spewing inflammatory falsehoods in an election year.

title: Harris Leads Trump In Latest Poll Ahead Of Tonight's Democratic Convention
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris holds a narrow lead over her Republican rival Donald Trump in the upcoming presidential election, according to a Washington Post-ABC News-Ipsos poll.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris holds a narrow lead over her Republican rival Donald Trump in the upcoming presidential election, according to a Washington Post-ABC News-Ipsos poll.

title: Philippine Vessel "Deliberately" Collided With Chinese Vessel: Beijing
content: China's Coast Guard said a Philippine vessel that had ignored its repeated warnings "deliberately collided" with a Chinese vessel in an "unprofessional and dangerous" manner in the disputed South China Sea, according to statements on Monday.
summary: China's Coast Guard said a Philippine vessel that had ignored its repeated warnings "deliberately collided" with a Chinese vessel in an "unprofessional and dangerous" manner in the disputed South China Sea, according to statements on Monday.
